name: Rising & Falling The Video Game
description:
What engine was this game made in?:

This game was made in Clickteam Fusion 2.5, for the 2022-2023 New Year Jam!

Controls:
Arrow Keys

Story:

You play as an alien, his planet has been invaded by an evil bear!
He must rise to the top to find and defeat the bear!

Gameplay:

Climb to the top and defeat the boss!
